name: ENMAX 128GB 2.5 SATA III Laptop & Desktop SSD
details: This ENMAX is shock-proof, durable, and highly reliable SSD that will represent the best quality. This SSD has a 7mm plastic case that is suitable for desktops, notebooks, mini computers, all-in-ones and other commercial PCs. It's high-quality TLC flash, coupled with industry-leading high-quality controllers will ensure excellent stability on all platforms. Its maximum read speed is 550 MB/s and write speed is 500 MB/s.

name: ENMAX 256GB 2.5 SATA III Laptop & Desktop SSD
details: This ENMAX SSD comes with 256GB storage capacity. It is shock-proof, durable, and highly reliable SSD. This SSD is designed by 7mm plastic case which will be ideal set for desktop, notebook, mini computer, all-in-one and other commercial PC. It has high-quality TLC flash technology that will ensure excellent stability on all platforms with high-quality controllers. Its MAX read speed is 550 MB/s and write speed is 500 MB/s.

name: KingSpec P3 256GB 2.5'' SATA SSD
details: The KingSpec P3 2.5'' SATA SSD comes with 256GB capacity. It offers fast and continuous read-write speeds to help improve working efficiency, gaming experience, and graphics quality. This SSD featured Exclusive 3D NAND Firmware technology, which is a Strict selection of stable and high-performance 64-layer. KingSpec P3 SSD comes with a High-level LDPC Debugging Mechanism, that ensures the accuracy of data transmission, protects data security, and extends useful life.

name: Adata SU650 256GB 2.5 SATA SSD
details: The Adata SU650 solid-state drive has a 256GB capacity that uses 3D NAND flash and a high relative interface. It is an outstanding alternative with a terrific cost combination for those who desire to enjoy error-free PC performance. Also, this SU650 has super read/write speeds that are more reliable than 2D NAND SSDs. To achieve optimal data throughput and reliability, it includes SLC storage and advanced error-correcting technology.

name: TwinMOS AlphaPro 256GB NVMe M.2 SSD
details: This AlphaPro solid-state drive from TwinMOS uses the NVMe (Non-Volatile Memory Express) protocol to deliver high-speed data transfer rates. It's designed in the M.2 2280 form factor to fit into compatible motherboard slots. With a capacity of 256GB, it's great for storing your operating system, applications, and some games or files. Compared to traditional hard drives, it provides faster boot times and improved overall system performance.

name: TwinMos H2 Ultra 512GB SATA III SSD
details: The TwinMos H2 Ultra SSD is suitable for SATA-based use in an existing PC or MAC desktop or laptop computer. It has a storage capacity of 512GB. It features 2.5-inch SATA III compatibility. This SSD has read speeds of up to 580 MB/s and writes of up to 550 MB/s.

name: Transcend SSD225S 500GB 2.5 SSD with 3D NAND
details: This Transcend SSD225S comes with 500GB storage capacity including a 2.5 SATAIII high-performance interface that offers exceptional transfer speeds and data integrity. With 3D NAND flash type and LDPC coding, this SSD ensures that your data is safe and secure. It also features a built-in SLC caching technology that provides faster transfer speeds. The SSD supports DevSleep ultra-low power state, S.M.A.R.T. TRIM, and NCQ commands.

name: Ramsta S600 240GB Internal SSD
details: This Ramsta S600 internal SSD features a 2.5-inch, light, and thin body dimension of 100 x 70 x 6.9 mm, shockproof, low and high-temperature resistance, anti-static, anti-magnetic, anti-X-ray, and heat protection. It has 240GB storage capacity.

name: Intel S4600 480GB SATA 2.5 Server SSD
details: The Dell S4600 server SSD comes with a 480GB storage capacity. This is a server SSD that is durable, shock-proof, and highly reliable. This SSD has a Read Transfer Rate of 500 MB/s and a Write Transfer Rate of 480 MB/s. This is compatible with all HPE, and DELL servers.

name: AData Ultimate SU650 120GB SATA Solid State Drive
details: The AData Ultimate SU650 SSD comes with 120GB capacity. It supports advanced error correction code technology that can detect and fix errors to ensure optimized data integrity. This SSD can offer a read performance of up to 520MB/s and a write performance of up to 450MB/s. It includes 3D NAND Flash which provides 25% more reliability than 2D NAND SSD. This SSD has no mechanical components inside, so it works under shock, vibration, and extreme temperatures. Also consumes much less power, and keeps data better protected at all times.

name: Apacer AS340 Panther 120GB SATA 6GB/s SSD
details: The Apacer AS340 has a SATA III interface and sequential read and write speeds of up to 550 / 550 MB/s, 3D TLC NAND flash, 40°C ~ +85°C storage temperature, advanced wear-leveling & up to 72bit/1KB ECC function, 2.5 inch form factor. 0~2000Hz vibration, KCC / CE / FCC / VCCI / RCM / BSMI certificate, (L)100 x (W) 69.9 x (H) 7mm dimension
